attributes.action: To free Zimbabwe from Robert Mugabe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The United Nations, European Union, Amnesty International andcountless human rights group's have highlighted the sufferingin Zimbabwe. This dictator has raped his own country and persecuted his ownpeople. It's time for the British to do the right thing andremove him from power. Historian's say the greatest gift wegave to the world was a modern democracy and it's our duty (asthe mother of all parliaments) to defend the liberty andfreedom of the citizens of Zimbabwe. Please help them Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
